definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create

sentences.english: The spirit that hovers over the chaos in Genesis 1, that refers to the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 《创世纪》第一章盘旋在混沌之上的灵，指的是圣灵。

sentences.english: IT IS written in the Bible’s Book of Genesis that Methuselah lived to be 969.
sentences.chinese: 圣经的创世纪中写到玛土撒拉活了969岁。

sentences.english: IT IS written in the Bible's Book of Genesis that Methuselah lived to be 969.
sentences.chinese: 圣经的创世纪中写到玛土撒拉活了969岁。

sentences.english: So there are seven occurrences of the word "good" in Genesis.
sentences.chinese: 在《创世纪》中，“好“这个词出现了七次。
现在注意《创世纪》中的不同点。

sentences.english: In Genesis, God said that sex makes two people one.
sentences.chinese: 在《创世纪》中，上帝说性爱使人合二为一。

sentences.english: Will you be tested from Genesis on?
God's first command to the first couple was to be fruitful and multiply.
sentences.chinese: 在《创世纪》中的第一个故事中。

sentences.english: One of the most famous is in Genesis 13:7.
sentences.chinese: 其中比较著名的是，在《创世纪》第13章第7节。

sentences.english: Now keep that scripture in mind,that's a quotation from Genesis.
sentences.chinese: 记住这句话，那是引自《创世纪》中的一句话。

sentences.english: The theology packed in Joseph's statement in Genesis 50:20 is astounding.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟在创世纪50章20节中提到的神学是让震惊的。

sentences.english: So, in Genesis 18, therefore, the Lord prepares.
sentences.chinese: 因此在创世纪第十八章里，神预备撒拉的心。

sentences.english: You can find this in Genesis 2:3-5.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在《创世纪》第二章第三到第五节找到。

sentences.english: These are contained in Genesis 12 through 50.
sentences.chinese: 这段故事包括在创世纪的第12至50章中。

sentences.english: In Exodus, He's the Passover Lamb.
sentences.chinese: 在创世纪，耶稣是亚伯拉罕祭坛上的公羊。

sentences.english: But where in Genesis 1 and 2 is divorce ever mentioned? Nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 但在《创世纪》第1和2章里有提到离婚吗？没有。

definition: the Revelation of St John the divine/the Apocalypse
Book of Exodus/Second Book of Moses
Book of Genesis/First Book of Moses
the Pentateuch/the five books of Moses in the Old Testament
Book of Job (in the Old Testament)
the creation (in mythology and Genesis 1-2)/the first foundational steps
